Training Manager Job at RSIN Group




        
    

        
        RSIN was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Fuzhou, Fujian Province . we mainly conduct business in Nigeria and other western African countries. over the past 20 years of development, we have become a multinational corporation with diversified industrial clusters of iron and steel, textile, fiber chemical and lead-acid battery manufacturing based on the construction of circular economy industrial park

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Training Manager

Job Locations: Abuja, Abeokuta - Ogun and Aba - Abia
Employment Type: Full-time

Job responsibilities
     

            
    




	Based on the company's business objectives and employee needs, develop a training plan and ensure its implementation.
	Design and develop various training programs, including new employee onboarding training, skill enhancement training, leadership development training, etc.
	Regularly communicate with various departments to understand their training needs, and analyze and organize them.
	Complete other tasks assigned by the leader.


Job requirements


	Bachelor's degree or above, with priority given to majors related to human resource management, enterprise management, etc.
	At least 3 years of training work experience, and at least 3 years of training manager/supervisor or related position experience.
	Familiar with training processes and methods, possessing good course design, evaluation, and implementation abilities; Good communication and coordination skills and teamwork spirit; Proficient in using office software and training related software.
	25-35 years old, in good health and without any bad habits.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: isreal@hengxingcompany.com , stellarinternationalhr@gmail.com using the Job Position and Location as the subject of the email.

	Write codes, build applications, and manage end-to-end life cycle of software and applications.
	Develop scalable software solutions, security maintenance, and performance aspects throughout the development process.
	Develop and implement APIs and microservices.
	Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and industry trends.
	Work with teams, including designers and product managers to understand project requirements and translate them into technical solutions.

	A Bachelors Degree in Computer Science, or a relating field.
	3+ years’ experience as a Full Stack Developer, or a similar role.
	Experience with frameworks, and proficiency in server languages such as; React, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, Python, MySQL and so on.
	Passion for learning, improving, and collaborating with others.
